answerText: Tet Offensive[10] Another long-lasting portion of the Tet Offensive was the siege of this Marine base on the border with Laos. It was important primarily because of its airstrip.

question: Question: The last site of fighting during this campaign was the city of Hu√©. For 10 points each: [10] Name this 1968 wave of attacks that targeted nine cities in all. It included an attack on the U.S. embassy in Saigon by a team of 19 Vietcong guerillas.
